passages.text:
You approach a strange plastic box, tucked away in the back of an old closet.  This seems to have been an impromptu office of some sort.

[[What is that thing?]]
[[How am I supposed to use it?]]
[[p:(Action) Punch the plastic box.]]

links.name: How am I supposed to use it?
links.link: How am I supposed to use it?

passages.name: start

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::It's an old computing box, remember?  We used to see these all of the time when we lived here.

Jasper,surprised::They're very valuable now.  There aren't enough rare metals on the surface to produce them anymore.

Jasper,head_tilted::I'm surprised it hasn't been stolen actually.  I guess the Ferryman did say people don't come down here much.

[[C->start]]
passages.name: What is that thing?

passages.text:
The machine whirs to life following your swift strike.  You can hear worn belts being driven for the first time in decades.  A series of strange beeps are emitted like rifle fire.

Jasper,surprised::That worked?

[[C->Juggler]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Punch the plastic box.

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::I think you use these arrow keys to move around the screen, and this button to select stuff.

Jasper,thinking::I don't know how to turn it on, though.

[[C->start]]
passages.name: How am I supposed to use it?

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::What is this?  It's just some weird dancing juggler program.

Jasper,thinking::This isn't what we want.

[[p:(Action) Hit it again.]]
passages.name: Juggler

passages.text:
The program changes again following the second strike.  The computing box now loads a set of text documents.  It looks like you can search through them.

[[p:(Action) Read through the text documents.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Read through the text documents.
links.link: p:(Action) Read through the text documents.

passages.name: p:(Action) Hit it again.
p:(Action) Read through the text documents.
